TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ChangeEventHandler(object o, ChangeEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ChangeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ChangeEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ChangeEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ChangeEventHandler is removed from the event.
